title: Thank you Riot for this change in patch 6.18!
body: With the shorter elo decay immunity duration on master and challenger tier, this means LESS SMURFING at lower elos!  Also, because these players have to play more games to maintain their ranking, this makes these tiers more competitive!

The best thing about Gnar is his mini-mega mechanic. Getting shat on by Gnar when he only needs to go mini mode is stupid. Gnar should win/lose games if he can manage his rage well in teamfights, not just auto-win because he built Frozen Mallet and he can infinitely kite everything in mini form (The main reason I see Gnar players losing is because noob Gnar players don't realize you're not supposed to rush Frozen Mallet into every matchup)

Mini gnar is for the lane phase where u can dish out damage tht cant be returned. mega is for the team fight utility and playmaking capabilities. 

but frozen mallet is something u only get when you are ahead and the nerf to that item makes it more ambiguous now... (its more tanky than a damage item so u can just rush it anyway now) 

also being shit on by gnar in mini mode would still happen even if his main item is gone because of his q and the low cooldown slows

gnar just does silly damage for a tanky beast when he gts mad.

He's supposed to single people down and kill them in Mini mode, not Mega, that's why he's got that W and so much mobility/harass. I agree that Mega mode is the coolest part of his kit but it's not there to lock kills--it gives him enough beef and CC to engage a fignt/disrupt a team's initiation  and unload a nice rotation of AOE damage for teamfights.  However: as far as single-target damage or locking individual kills is concerned, Gnar's ability to do so is a LOT better in mini-mode.
Gnar nerf is basically meaningless considering where his so called "problem" isn't what they nerfed.

That argument goes both ways. If his W did physical damage all the %arpen Gnar invested in ({{item:3071}} or the keystone, for example) would apply to both his W and the other physical-damage sources in his kit and would probably have a much higher DPS as a result. Being gridlocked out of being able to get any sort of %mpen, on top of the breadth of different items that grant MR, stunts the amount of damage his is able to do with it.
